medical_history.chief_complaint: Development of left eye redness and photophobia after self-discontinuing prednisone, followed by photophobia in the right eye.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began one month after discharge from hospitalization for MIS-C. Initially, the patient experienced left eye redness and photophobia, followed a few days later by photophobia in the right eye. Over the course of 9 months, he experienced multiple recurrences (3 total) of inflammation in both eyes.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient has a history of obesity, asthma, and COVID-19 infection one month prior requiring hospitalization.
